name: RE-Cycle
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Find the way out of the dungeon by cycling over and over again thought old versions of time and using that as adventage.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

  • Use the ARROWS to control your character;
  • Use the SPACE bar to Re-Cycle;
  • Use R to restart the level;
  • Use ESC to close the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

DEVELOPER NOTES:

I don't think the game will win the jam neither get great pontuation, but I tried! The game was made in the last 4 days of the jam and here are some considerations you should be aware of:

  • There are bugs I'm already aware of;
  • There's no sound, so I'm not ashamed of getting a 0 in sound design;
  • It's only available for windows (for now);
  • This is just the JAM BUILD and I'll fix some bugs and improve the game in the version 1.0.1.

I guess that's it! Bye ;)

CURRENT VERSION: 1.0.0 (Jam build)
